ygData.subject: Silence
ygData.msgSnippet: A pod that had fallen from the sky, long since forgotten.  The pod stayed in statis mode for all this time. Now, as the programs dictate, the bot awakens. The

A pod that had fallen from the sky, long since forgotten.  The pod
stayed in statis mode for all this time. Now, as the programs dictate,
the bot awakens.  

The optics flicker. The hydrolics in the joints move.  The spark pumps
mech fluid.  Power levels rise and programs reactive.  The life of the
bot restarts and the Matrix wills another to join the fight of the
universe for the universe. 

The pod opens. A hand reaches up and lightly clasps the rim.  Sitting
up, the bot looks about.  Blue sky, white clouds float over head.  The
sun shines down warmth and light.  A gentle breeze caresses the face
plates of the bot. A scent on the wind, barely noticible, but there
all the same.  Causion stirs in the mind of the bot.  Optics focus,
autio sencors adjust to listen for the slightest noise.  The bot
stands up, not a sound is made.  She stands in white and gold
transmetal skin.  Her form small, yet powerful.  She looks up again. 
With a sigh, transforms into BARN OWL form and takes to the skies. Not
a sound is made as she changes her shape.  She rises to just above the
tree tops and slowly surveys her new home.  

She lets her talons spread as she glides down silently and perches on
a tree branch high in the trees.   She looks about her and wonders how
she came to be here.  She checks her programs, all seem to be
functional except her mission logs where wiped out during her
transport.  On her left ankle, she could see a symbol. It was Maximal.
 But she knew not what it meant.  She searched her memory banks for
her identity in hopes it would give her a clue as to why she was
there.  Her name, was "SILENCE".   Her programmed instincts told her
to seek out other maximals. Other than that, she knew not what to do.  

She spread her soft white wings and let her body take to the wind. 
Her form glided effortlessly back towards the pod.  She landed on the
edge and with her beak, she hit the homing beacon on the pod.  A
maximal signal would be sent out. With luck, they would find her soon.
 With that accomplished, she flew up back into the trees and hid.  She
knew that if maximals could find her signal, others might too.  She
hid herself in the trees, but kept a sharp owl eye on the pod.  
She waited, she watched, in perfect...silence.
